effect.sun_moon: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.

short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.
